SELECT A.SITE_SEQ, A.CUST_SEQ, A.SITE_NM, A.LAT, A.LNG, A.ZIPCD, A.ADDR, A.ADDR_ADT, A.DST_NM, A.DST_CD, A.RMRK, A.ADDR_SIDO, A.ADDR_SIGUNGU, A.ADDR_EUBMYUN, A.ADDR_DONGRI, A.CNT_PSN_HPNO, A.CNT_PSN_NM, F.GENT_QNT, F.ACCUM_GENT_QNT, SUM(G.INSTL_CPCT) AS INSTL_CPCT FROM REMS.SITE_INF A LEFT OUTER JOIN REMS.DEV_INF G ON A.SITE_SEQ = G.SITE_SEQ AND G.SVC_CD = 'PV_POW' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SA.SITE_SEQ, SUM(SA.GENT_QNT) AS GENT_QNT, SUM(SA.ACCUM_GENT_QNT) AS ACCUM_GENT_QNT FROM REMS.invrtr_oprt_min_hst SA LEFT JOIN REMS.invrtr_oprt_min_hst SB ON SA.SITE_SEQ = SB.SITE_SEQ AND SA.DEV_SEQ = SB.DEV_SEQ AND SA.SVC_CD = SB.SVC_CD AND SA.MSR_TOD < SB.MSR_TOD WHERE SB.SITE_SEQ IS NULL AND SA.SVC_CD = 'PV_POW' GROUP BY SA.SITE_SEQ ) F ON A.SITE_SEQ = F.SITE_SEQ
GROUP BY A.SITE_SEQ, A.CUST_SEQ, A.SITE_NM, A.LAT, A.LNG, A.ZIPCD, A.ADDR, A.ADDR_ADT, A.DST_NM, A.DST_CD, A.RMRK, A.ADDR_SIDO, A.ADDR_SIGUNGU, A.ADDR_EUBMYUN, A.ADDR_DONGRI, A.CNT_PSN_HPNO, A.CNT_PSN_NM, F.GENT_QNT, F.ACCUM_GENT_QNT
